channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report X-2023070747
item.description:
Report X-2023070747

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-05T21:09:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-04
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS UNLOADED IN PORTLAND WITH A WET SPOT ON THE BOX. THE PACKAGE WAS PUT IN A HAZ TOTE AND TAKEN TO QA DescribePack: ONE OF THE PAINT CANS HAD A LOOSE LID ALL LIQUID THAT LEAKED OUT WAS ABSORBED BY THE BOX DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PUT IN A HAZ TOTE AND TAKEN TO QA

item.title: Report X-2023070645
item.description:
Report X-2023070645

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-05T21:09:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-30
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was brought to Quality Assurance wet and leaking in a hazmat bag and bin after being found. DescribePack: 2 Aerosol cans had their lids off and had lost all inner contents DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: package was placed into a hazmat bag and spill bin upon discovery.

item.title: Report X-2023070597
item.description:
Report X-2023070597

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-01T03:13:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-28
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered leaking and removed from sortation, then brought to QA. DescribePack: One tub's lid was ajar and contents were leaking. No inner packing and no hazardous labelling. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed right side up in spill bin and brought to appropriate damage processing area.
